nn-NO.Hvor store er ekstrautgiftene per måned?: Kor store er ekstrautgiftene per månad?
nn-NO.<p>Grunnstønad til transport skal dekke:
Grunnstønad til transport skal dekkje ekstrautgifter du har grunna ein medisinsk tilstand.

Grunnstønad kan dekkje differansen mellom utgiftene du hadde før den medisinske tilstanden, og utgiftene du har i dag. Dersom dette ikkje er mogleg, samanliknar vi med kva som er vanleg blant jamaldrande der du bur.

Grunnstønad dekkjer nødvendige ekstrautgifter og tek utgangspunktet i billegaste reisemåte. Kva reisemåte som er nødvendig, må vurderast i kvart enkelt tilfelle.

    Grunnstønad dekkjer ikkje utgifter til følgjande:
  • Transport til og frå barnehage, grunnskule og vidaregåande skule som kommunen eller fylkeskommunen skal dekkje.
  • Annan transport som blir dekt av kommunen, til dømes transport til avlasting og dagtilbod.
  • Transport til medisinsk behandling som blir dekt gjennom pasientreiser (sjukehus, lege og så vidare). Les meir om pasientreiser på Helsenorge.no (blir opna i ny fane).
  • Eigendel ved TT-kort
nn-NO.Hvordan dekker du transportbehovet ditt: Korleis dekkjer du transportbehovet ditt i dag?
nn-NO.<h3>Egen bil</h3>\n<p>Når NAV vurderer g:
Eigen bil

Når NAV vurderer grunnstønad til drift av eigen bil, undersøkjer vi kva utgifter du hadde før den medisinske tilstanden. Dersom du på dette tidspunktet hadde eigen bil, vil du allereie ha utgifter til årsavgift, forsikring, drift og vedlikehold. Grunnlaget for vurderinga vil vere ekstrautgiftene du har etter den medisinske tilstanden. Dette kan vere auka driftsutgifter, auka forsikringsutgifter eller anna.

Vi reknar ut utgiftene med utgangspunkt i SIFO sitt referansebudsjett for forbruksutgifter. Du kan lese meir om SIFO sitt referansebudsjett på nettsidene til SIFO (blir opna i ny fane).
nn-NO.<h3>Kollektiv transport</h3>\n<p>Dersom:
Kollektiv transport

Dersom transportbehovet kan løysast ved å nytte kollektivtransport, vil du som hovudregel ikkje ha nødvendige ekstrautgifter. Dette er utgifter som andre også har.
nn-NO.<h3>Drosje</h3>\n<p>Utgifter til drosje:
Drosje

Utgifter til drosje blir vurderte der det ikkje finst rimelegare alternativ til transport. Dersom du nyttar drosje, må du som hovudregel sende inn dokumentasjon i form av kvitteringar for ein periode på tre månader.
nn-NO.<h3>Kjørt av andre</h3>\n<p>Ved beregnin:
Køyrd av andre

Vi nyttar satsane for pasientreiser når vi reknar ut ekstrautgifter ved bruk av privatbil køyrd av andre. Du kan lese meir om dette på sidene om pasientreiser på Helsenorge.no (blir opna i ny fane).

nn-NO.<p>Grunnstønad til transport skal dekke:
Grunnstønad til transport skal dekkja ekstrautgifter barnet har grunna ein medisinsk tilstand.

Grunnstønad kan dekkje differansen mellom dei utgiftene barnet hadde før den medisinske tilstanden og dei utgiftene barnet har i dag. Dersom dette ikkje er mogleg, samanliknar vi med kva som er vanleg blant jamaldrande der barnet bur.

Grunnstønad dekkjer nødvendige ekstrautgifter og tek utgangspunktet i billigaste reisemåte. Kva reisemåte som er nødvendig må vurderast i kvart enkelt tilfelle.

Grunnstønad dekkjer ikkje utgifter til:
  • Transport til og frå barnehage, grunnskule og vidaregåande skule som kommunen eller fylkeskommunen skal dekkja.
  • Annan transport som blir dekt av kommunen, som til dømes transport til avlasting og dagtilbod.
  • Transport til medisinsk behandling som blir dekt gjennom pasientreiser (sjukehus, lege og så vidare). Les meir om pasientreiser på Helsenoreg.no (blir opna i ny fane).
  • Eigendel ved TT-kort

en.Svar på brev om vurdering av grunnstønad: Response to letter on assessment of basic benefit
en.<p>Vi har tatt opp saken til ny vurderin:
We are reassessing the basic benefit. We refer to the letter you have received from us. Please answer the questions here.

If you wish to apply for an increased basic benefit, you can click on this link: Application for basic benefit (opens in a new tab).
en.Svarer du for deg selv eller på vegne av: Are you responding for yourself or on behalf of another person?
I am responding on behalf of myself.
en.Jeg svarer på vegne av en annen person o: I am responding on behalf of another person over the age of 18.
en.Jeg svarer på vegne av eget barn under 1: I am responding on behalf of my own child, who is under the age of 18.
en.Jeg svarer på vegne av fosterbarn / barn: I am responding  on behalf of a foster child / child living in emergency foster care, who is under the age of 18.

Please fill in the national identity number and personal information of the person you are responding on behalf of.

en.Oppgi barnets bosettingsland: Please specify the child’s country of residence

en.<p>Grunn- og hjelpestønad til barn som e:
Basic and attendance benefit for children who are placed in foster care pursuant to barnevernsloven § 5-1 (former barnevernloven § 4-12) is paid to the foster parents.

Basic and attendance benefit for children who are placed in foster care or in an emergency foster home pursuant to barnevernsloven § 3-2 (former barnevernloven § 4-4) is paid to child welfare services.
en.Hvis du ønsker å endre kontonummer kan d: If you wish to change your account number, please submit form NAV 95-20.00 Notification of new bank account number (opens in new tab).

en.Svar på spørsmålene i brevet fra NAV: Answer the questions in the letter from NAV
en.Har NAV bedt om dokumentasjon på drift a: Has NAV asked for documentation of the operation of technical aids in the letter?
en.Hvor store er ekstrautgiftene per måned?: How much are the additional expenses per month?
en.<p>Grunnstønad til transport skal dekke:
Basic benefit for transport is intended to cover additional expenses you incur because of a medical condition.

The basic benefit can cover the difference between the expenses you had before the medical condition and the expenses you have today. If that is not possible, we compare your expenses to what is common among other people your age where you live.

Basic benefit covers necessary expenses and is based on the least expensive mode of transport. Which mode of transport is considered necessary, will have to be decided based on the circumstances of each case.

    Basic benefit does not cover expenses for:
  • Transport to and from kindergarten or primary or secondary education, which is covered by the municipality or county .
  • Other transport covered by the municipality, such as transport to and from relief care or daily activities.
  • Transport to medical treatment covered through patient travel (hospital, physician, etc.). Read more about patient travel at Helsenorge.no (will open in a new tab).
  • TT card user fees
en.Hvordan dekker du transportbehovet ditt: How do you cover your transport needs today?
en.<h3>Egen bil</h3>\n<p>Når NAV vurderer g:
Personal vehicle

When NAV considers basic benefit for operation of a personal vehicle, we will consider the expenses you had before the medical condition. If you already had a personal vehicle, you will have already incurred expenses in connection with annual motor vehicle tax, insurance, operation and maintenance. The basis for NAV’s assessment will then the additional expenses you have incurred with the medical condition. This could be increased fuel expenses, increased insurance expenses, etc.

We use SIFO’s reference budget for consumer expenses when we calculate expenses. Read more about SIFO’s reference budget on SIFO’s website (will open in a new tab).
en.<h3>Kollektiv transport</h3>\n<p>Dersom:
Public transport

If transport needs can be met by using public transport, you will as a general rule not be considered to have additional expenses. These expenses are the same as everyone else’s.
en.<h3>Drosje</h3>\n<p>Utgifter til drosje:
Taxi

Taxi expenses will be considered in situations where there is no other, less expensive transport option available. If you use taxi transport, you must as a general rule submit documentation, in the form of receipts, for a period of three months.
en.<h3>Kjørt av andre</h3>\n<p>Ved beregnin:
Driven by others

When calculating additional expenses in connection with use of personal vehicle, driven by others, we apply the rates used by Patient Travel. Read more about this on Helsenorge’s web pages about Patient Travel (will open in a new tab).
en.Er du innvilget TT-kort?: Have you been granted a TT-card?
en.Oppgi antall turer per halvår, eller kro: Please specify trips per six-month period, or NOK per six-month period
en.Oppgi antall turer per halvår: Please specify trips per six-month period
en.Oppgi kroner per halvår: Please specify amount in NOK per six-month period
en.Hvor langt klarer du å gå på en normal d: How far are you able to walk on a normal day?
en.Hvor langt er det til nærmeste offentlig: How far is it to your closest public transport option?
en.Kan du bruke offentlige transportmidler?: Are you able to use public transport?
en.Har du tilgang til egen bil?: Do you have access to a personal vehicle?
en.Ja, familien min har egen bil: Yes, my family has a car
en.Ja, jeg bruker firmabil: Yes, I use a company car
en.Ja, jeg kan låne bil: Yes, I am able to borrow a car
en.Nei, jeg har ikke tilgang på bil: No, I do not have access to a car
en.Bruker noen andre bilen?: Is anybody else using the car?
en.Aktuelle reisemål du trenger transport f: Destinations you need transport to get to
en.Oppgi adressen du reiser fra: Please specify the address you are travelling from
en.Oppgi adressen du reiser til: Please specify the address you are travelling to
en.Oppgi antall reiser. I neste felt velger: Please specify number of trips. In the next field, please select number of trips per week, month or year.
en.Har NAV bedt om dokumentasjon på transpo: Has NAV asked for documentation of transport in the letter?
en.Har du andre aktuelle opplysninger?: Do you have any other relevant information to provide?
en.Her kan du oppgi andre aktuelle opplysni: Use this field to provide additional information
en.<p>Grunnstønad til transport skal dekke:
Basic transport benefits are intended to cover additional expenses incurred by the child due to a medical condition.

Basic benefit can cover the difference between the expenses the child had before the medical condition and the expenses the child has today. If this is not possible, we compare this with what is common among the children the same age, where the child lives.

Basic benefit covers necessary expenses and is based on the least expensive mode of transport. Which mode of transport is considered necessary, will have to be decided based on the circumstances of each case.

Basic benefit does not cover expenses for:
  • Transport to and from kindergarten or primary or secondary education, which is covered by the municipality or county .
  • Other transport covered by the municipality, such as transport to and from relief care or daily activities.
  • Transport to medical treatment covered through patient travel (hospital, physician, etc.). Read more about patient travel at Helsenorge.no (will open in a new tab).
  • TT card user fees
en.Hvordan dekker barnet transportbehovet s: How does the child cover their transport needs today?
en.Er barnet innvilget TT-kort?: Has the child been granted a TT-card?
en.Hvor langt klarer barnet å gå på en norm: How far is the child able to walk on a normal day?
en.Kan barnet bruke offentlige transportmid: Is the child able to use public transport?
en.Har barnet tilgang til egen bil?: Does the child have access to a car?
en.Ja, barnet har egen bil: Yes, the child has a car
en.Ja, familien har egen bil: Yes, the family has a car
en.Ja, barnet kjøres i lånt bil: Yes, the child is being driven in a borrowed car
en.Nei, barnet har ikke tilgang på bil: No, the child does not have access to a car
en.Aktuelle reisemål barnet trenger transpo: Destinations the child needs transport to get to
en.Oppgi adressen barnet reiser fra: Please specify the address the child is travelling from
en.Oppgi adressen barnet reiser til: Please specify the address the child is travelling to
en.Hvor ofte reiser barnet?: How often does the child travel?
en.<p>Grunnstønad til transport skal dekke:
Basic benefit for transport is intended to cover additional expenses the person incur because of a medical condition.

The basic benefit can cover the difference between the expenses he/she had before the medical condition and the expenses he/she has today. If that is not possible, we compare his/hers expenses to what is common among other people his/her age where the person lives.

Basic benefit covers necessary expenses and is based on the least expensive mode of transport. Which mode of transport is considered necessary, will have to be decided based on the circumstances of each case.

Basic benefit does not cover expenses for:
  • Transport to and from kindergarten or primary or secondary education, which is covered by the municipality or county .
  • Other transport covered by the municipality, such as transport to and from relief care or daily activities.
  • Transport to medical treatment covered through patient travel (hospital, physician, etc.). Read more about patient travel at Helsenorge.no (will open in a new tab).
  • TT card user fees
en.Hvordan dekker personen du svarer for tr: How does the person you are responding for cover their transport needs today?
en.Er personen du svarer for innvilget TT-k: Has the person you are responding for been granted a TT-card?
en.Kan personen du svarer for bruke offentl: Is the person you are responding for able to use public transport?
en.Har personen du svarer for tilgang til e: Does the person you are responding for have access to a personal vehicle?
en.Ja, kan låne bil: Yes, are able to borrow a car
en.Nei, har ikke tilgang på bil: No, does not have access to a car
en.Aktuelle reisemål personen du svarer for: Destinations the person you are responding for needs transport to get to
en.Oppgi adressen personen du svarer for re: Please specify the address the person you are responding for is travelling from
Please specify the address the person you are responding for is travelling to
en.Hvor ofte reiser personen du svarer for?: How often does the person you are responding for travel?
en.Har NAV bedt om dokumentasjon på fordyre: Has NAV asked for documentation of additional food expenses in the letter?
en.<p>Du får grunnstønad på grunn av ekstra:
You are receiving basic benefit due to extra wear and tear or frequent washing of clothes, shoes and bedding caused by the medical condition.

Basic benefit is not granted for mattresses, duvets, pillows, towels or cloths.
en.Beskriv hvorfor du sliter ut klær, sko o: Please describe why you wear out clothing, footwear and bed linens
en.Hvor mange ganger per uke benyttes vask: How many additional times per week is the washing machine/tumble dryer used?
en.Ekstrautgifter til klær, sko og sengetøy: Additional expenses for wear and tear on clothing, footwear and bedlinen
en.Oppgi plagg, sko eller sengetøy du har e: Please specify the clothing, footwear or bed linens you have incurred additional expenses to purchase
en.Kun én type per boks. Har du ekstrautgif: One type per box. If you have additional expenses for more than one type of object, you can add more by clicking “Add new clothing item/footwear/bed linen” after filling out below.
en.Har NAV bedt om dokumentasjon på slitasj: Has NAV asked for documentation of wear and tear on clothes, shoes and bedding in the letter?
en.<p>Barnet får grunnstønad på grunn av ek:
The child is receiving basic benefit due to extra wear and tear or frequent washing of clothes, shoes and bedding caused by the medical condition.

Basic benefit is not granted for mattresses, duvets, pillows, towels or cloths.
en.Beskriv hvorfor barnet sliter ut klær, s: Please describe why the child wears out clothing, footwear and bed linens
en.Oppgi plagg, sko eller sengetøy barnet h: Please specify the clothing, footwear or bed linens the child has incurred additional expenses to purchase
en.Kun én type per boks. Har barnet ekstrau: One type per box. If the child has additional expenses for more than one type of object, you can add more by clicking “Add new clothing item/footwear/bed linen” after filling out below.
en.<p>Personen du svarer for får grunnstøna:
The person you are responding for is receiving basic benefit due to extra wear and tear or frequent washing of clothes, shoes and bedding caused by the medical condition.

Basic benefit is not granted for mattresses, duvets, pillows, towels or cloths.
en.Beskriv hvorfor personen du svarer for s: Describe why the person you're responding for wears out clothes, shoes, and bedding
en.Oppgi plagg, sko eller sengetøy personen: Please specify the clothing, footwear or bed linens the person you are responding for has incurred additional expenses to purchase
en.Kun én type per boks. Har personen du sv: One type per box. If the person you are responding for has additional expenses for more than one type of object, you can add more by clicking “Add new clothing item/footwear/bed linen” after filling out below.
en.Har NAV bedt om dokumentasjon i brevet?: Has NAV asked for documentation in the letter?
en.Hvis du har opplysninger du mener er vik: If you have additional information you believe is important, you can include it here
en.Dokumentasjon av ekstrautgifter til drif: Documentation of additional expenses for operation of assistive technology
en.Dokumentasjon av ekstrautgifter til tran: Documentation of additional expenses by transport
en.Dokumentasjon av ekstrautgifter til dros: Documentation of additional expenses by taxi
en.Du må som hovedregel dokumentere ekstrau: As a general rule, you must document your additional expenses with taxi receipts. You must specify on the receipt what the purpose of the trip was and the address you travelled to and from if the receipt does not already specify this.
en.Dokumentasjon av ekstrautgifter til ford: Documentation of additional food expenses due to a special diet
en.Dokumentasjon av ekstrautgifter til slit: Documentation of additional expenses for wear and tear on clothes, shoes and bedding
en.Ja, jeg legger det ved nå: Yes, I will attach it now
en.Hvor langt klarer personen du svarer for: How far is the person you are responding for able to walk in a normal day?
en.Jeg ettersender dokumentasjonen senere (: I will send the documentation later (I am aware that NAV can not process the case until I have submitted the documentation)
